import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.math.BigInteger;
class fact{
static int ans[][];
static int arr[];
public static void main(String args[])throws IOException{
solve();}
public static void pre()
{
int i,j,k,m,c;
ans=new int[10][4002];
for(int a=2;a<=9;a++){
	arr=new int[4002];
	arr[1]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=4000;i++){
		c=0;
		for(j=1;j<=i;j++){
			arr[j]*=a;
		}
		for(k=1;k<=i;k++){
			arr[k+1]+=arr[k]/10;
			arr[k]%=10;
		}
		for(m=1;m<=i;m++)
			c+=arr[m];
		ans[a][i]=c;
		
	}
}
}
public static void solve()throws IOException 
{
int T;
int A,B;
Scanner cons=new Scanner(System.in);
//System.out.println("Lets test!");
pre();
T=cons.nextInt();
int tt=T;
int val;
while(T-->0){
A=cons.nextInt();
B=cons.nextInt();
if(A==1||B==0)
val=1;
else
val=ans[A][B];
System.out.println("Case "+(tt-T)+": "+val);}
}}
